summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5768 for the improvement of 55th Avenue Southwest, from West Dakota Street to Orleans Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76058, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
